mapper.sql: id, name, password, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT su.id id, su.`name` name, su.email email, su.mobile mobile, su.`status` `status`, su.dept_id dept_id, sd.name dept_name, sr.remark role_name, sr.id role_id FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.dept_id = sd.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id where su.del_flag = 0 order by su.create_time desc
